author: pburba
msg: Tweak a couple of merge_tests to check for correct svn:mergeinfo post-merge.
While testing a patch the helper setup_dir_replace set incorrect mergeinfo,
but the failure wasn't detected by the test suite until much later.
Finding regressions at the point of failure is a *good* thing.
skip prop check when calling run_and_verify_merge(), svn:mergeinfo is

author: malcolm
msg: When creating svn-commit.tmp, treat the error 'read-only filesystem'
